short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block Google Chat from 8:40 AM to 3:50 PM on Monday through Friday.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will block the use of google chat from the Gmail and Google Chat websites from 8:40 AM to 3:50PM on Monday through Friday.
